content: The Rat Imperial Guard's Spirit allows you to take the form of the Rat and lunge at your foes with razor-sharp scythes. Having the Rat Imperial Guard equipped also increases the amount of Focus you earn while Perfect Dodging. Perfect Dodging is a priceless skill in Black Myth: Wukong, as is Focus, which allows you to deliver stronger blows. Having both work together like that can be extremely helpful in combat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rat_Imperial_Guard_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Rat Imperial Guard Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Rat Imperial Guard Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Rat Imperial Guard's Spirit allows you to take the form of the Rat and lunge at your foes with razor-sharp scythes. Having the Rat Imperial Guard equipped also increases the amount of Focus you earn while Perfect Dodging. Perfect Dodging is a priceless skill in Black Myth: Wukong, as is Focus, which allows you to deliver stronger blows. Having both work together like that can be extremely helpful in combat.
